mapper.select:
select distinct t.total_m_no as no, e.exter_mem_name as name, e.exter_m_email as mail from external_m_info e join total_member t on t.EXTER_M_NO = e.EXTER_M_NO
e.exter_m_email LIKE #{search}

select distinct t.total_m_no as no, i.member_name as name, i.email as mail from inter_m_info i join total_member t on t.member_no = i.member_no
i.email LIKE #{search}

select distinct t.total_m_no as no, n.MEMBER_NAME as name, n.EMAIL as mail, i.INVITE_NO as inv_no from invite i join total_member t on i.total_m_no = t.total_m_no join inter_m_info n on n.MEMBER_NO = t.MEMBER_NO
i.TOTAL_M_NO = t.TOTAL_M_NO and i.invite_no=#{inv_no}
mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_no, invite_no, ntc_cont, ntc_date, total_m_no) values(notice_seq.nextval, #{inv_no}, '초대됐음!', sysdate, #{no});
